name: Shadow Ooze
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

trait.name: Amorphous
text: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Aura Of Darkness
text: The ooze devours all natural and magical light within 30 feet of it. This area is heavily obscured by darkness for all creatures except shadow fey.

trait.name: Spider Climb
text: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The ooze makes one pseudopod attack and then uses Snuff Out.

action.name: Pseudopod
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage and 3 (1d6) acid damage.

action.name: Snuff Out
text: The ooze extinguishes one natural or magical light source within 60 feet of it. If the light source is created by a spell, it is dispelled.
